text: Andinosaura oculata, the tropical lightbulb lizard, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Andinosaura Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 1879 Category:Taxa named by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
title: Andinosaura oculata
